page.title: 24TRADE AND VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: Spratton has a garage situated on the A5199 Welford Road. The village has 2 shops located in the centre of the village, a well-renowned butchers shop (Sauls) and a general village store. In addition there is a hairdressing salon and a recently opened beauty salon. The former Broomhill Hotel is in the process of being converted into a nursing home. There is one pub, The King's Head.
